subject: hidden field question
msgSnippet: I need to be able to retrieve the value of a hidden field on a form so I can use it to retrieve it again and do other manipulation on the data. I have tried
messageBody:
I need to be able to retrieve the value of a hidden field on a form so I
can use it to retrieve it again and do other manipulation on the data.

I have tried String NoteID =
form.getScriptableObject().getParameterValue("NoteId");

Which did not return me the ID it returned me $Note.getId().

Any help for this newbee is greatly appreciated.
